channel.title: fatal error: no workstation startup
channel.description:
After a few weeks of happy working with Whonix under VM I currently can no longer open the Workstation. Upon launching I get the following error: Fatal! Could not read from the boot medium.
Any suggestion? Cloning the workstation did not help either. I could reinstallin whonix but it zould be convenient to be able to recover my old workstation...
Thanx.

item.title: fatal error: no workstation startup
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
Sounds like this is happening at the virtualizer level - most likely not Whonix related.

Try searching “virtualbox fatal could not read boot medium”. Many hits.

Worst case: snapshot / disk image is corrupted. (VirtualBox is notorious for unreliable storage - even the forums recommend not using snapshots.)

Best case: you put a non-bootable CD in the virtual drive. Eject it and boot.

Read full topic
